comments.content:
I feel that Officiana Sans is a slightly condensed font as compared to Caslon. I think that Caslon is also a little too intricate to compliment a font as neat as Officiana Sans...

Is there any particular reason that you aren’t looking at Officiana Serif? That is a nice simple Slab serif Font that i think would work (it is a type system!) but then again it also depends on the context of it all.

If i had to pick a, I think Century Old Style?

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/scangraphic/century\_old\_style\_sh...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180959/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/scangraphic/century_old_style_sh/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/scangraphic/century\_old\_style\_sh/")
